name: Brostep
description: Offshoot of Dubstep which replaces its sub-bass-oriented sound with an emphasis on catchy or aggressive mid-range melodies.

children.name: Briddim
children.description: Combining the kick-clap rhythms and syncopation of Riddim with Brostep sound design.

children.name: Briddim
children.description: Combining the kick-clap rhythms and syncopation of Riddim with Brostep sound design.

children.name: Colour Bass
children.description: Combines aggressive wobbling basses with the euphoric drops of Melodic Dubstep and Future Bass.

children.name: Colour Bass
children.description: Combines aggressive wobbling basses with the euphoric drops of Melodic Dubstep and Future Bass.

children.name: Deathstep
children.description: Darker, heavier form of Brostep that uses "machine gun" basses, atonal synths, and elements from genres like Death Metal and Metalcore.

children.name: Deathstep
children.description: Darker, heavier form of Brostep that uses "machine gun" basses, atonal synths, and elements from genres like Death Metal and Metalcore.

children.name: Drumstep
children.description: Dancefloor-friendly, loud, and heavy combination of the drum programming and tempo of Jump-Up with the half-time rhythm and midrange LFO wobble of Brostep.

children.name: Drumstep
children.description: Dancefloor-friendly, loud, and heavy combination of the drum programming and tempo of Jump-Up with the half-time rhythm and midrange LFO wobble of Brostep.

children.name: Tearout [Brostep]
children.description: Heavy and distorted, closely affiliated with Deathstep and other styles of Brostep.
